scenario_text.value: Eeeeeek! Stay awaaay!
(The enemy’s going after Miu!)

(Is this pointless? Am I powerless to even
save those two on my own?)
No...I don’t think so!

We’ll definitely save Miu.
Never again...

We’ll never lose another friend...
We can’t let that happen!!!
Yeah... Yeah! What you said, Takuma!
Agumon! If we’re gonna protect our friends...
If we’re gonna save your world and mine...

I need your help. We’ll show them...
...show them how determined we are!

Yeah... Nngh... You’re right, Takuma. We
can’t afford to lose! No matter what!

Together...the strength of our feelings will
resonate and... Haaaugh!

Wh-what is this...?!
My body...my body is...!
AAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH!!!
Agumon?!

Something’s...strange, Takuma! It’s like
there’s a fire in my belly...

There’s a shiver going through my whole body!
Your feelings are flowing through me, Takuma!
Wait, is this...evolution?!
Aaah!!!
Agumon, evolve...!
Dinorexmon!!!

Incredible...
So much power!

*huff*... *huff*... *whew*
I thought I was gonna die!

You evolved in response to my desire to
protect them?

Yeah, I’m ready to go! This form is up to the
task!

C’mon, let’s do this! I’ll protect anything
and anyone you want me to, Takuma!

*huff*...*huff*...*huff*...! Keh heh...
Ahhhhahaha!
Agumon... That form...?

...Sorry for the wait, Takuma.
It’s time for my counterattack.
Check out Mugendramon in action!
